name: Davbindu Farmhouse
overview: Davbindu Farmhouse is a homely retreat just a 5-minute walk from Kelwa Beach. Surrounded by lush greenery and coconut trees, the farmhouse offers AC and Non-AC rooms with traditional home-cooked meals, a spacious lawn, and a peaceful environment perfect for families and groups.

location.address: Near Kelwa Beach, Palghar District, Maharashtra, India

facilities: Spacious lawn with banana, coconut and supari trees

allowed: Families, married couples, and groups only
not_allowed: More than 4 guests in one room
booking: Valid ID proof mandatory (Driving License, Voter ID, Aadhar, Passport)
liability: Management not liable for loss of belongings

reviews.author: Regular Visitor
reviews.text: I have been visiting this place since 2010. It feels like home away from home. The food is amazing and the hosts are like family.

reviews.author: Group Guest
reviews.text: We loved the atmosphere and spacious lawn. The food was delicious and it was an unforgettable experience.

reviews.author: New Guest
reviews.text: Clean rooms, peaceful vibe, great hospitality. Definitely visiting again!

notice: Beware of scammers. Confirm identity before making payments online.
